post.author: Kelly J Lee
post.content:
If you’re ever looking for a quick and easy way to make the world a better place, head on over to http://www.freerice.com/. It’s a really great idea – by playing the word game, you donate 10 grains of rice for every right word you guess. You can earn as much as 700 grains of rice in a short time (well, you can earn way more.  Not only are you improving your vocabulary but you’re helping feed hungry families across the world.

I think this is a great idea! And the best part is, you can play on and off whenever you want!
post.title: 단어 실력도 늘리고 좋은일도 하고...
